summary:
South Korea, officially the Republic of Korea, is a country in East Asia. It's located on the southern part of the Korean Peninsula and is home to around 52 million people. The capital, Seoul, is one of the world's biggest cities.

The peninsula has a long history, with early kingdoms dating back to the 7th century BCE. It was divided into North and South Korea after World War II. The Korean War (1950-1953) left the country in ruins, but South Korea has since become very successful, with a strong economy and a global influence in pop culture, known as the Korean Wave. It's also a member of important international groups like the G20.
title: South Korea
